pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integrate 'OpenAI' Large Language Models into Your 'R' Workflows // Utilizing the 'OpenAI' API as the back end (https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference), 'TheOpenAIR' offers 'R' wrapper functions for the 'ChatGPT' endpoint and several high-level functions that enable the integration of 'ChatGPT' capabilities in diverse data-related tasks, such as data cleansing and automated analytics script generation.
